items.name: Cheese Curds
items.description: Lightly breaded white curds, served with a side of ranch

items.name: Onion Rings
items.description: Thick sliced onions hand battered and deep fried to perfection. Served with a side of ranch

items.name: Hangover Fries
items.description: Fries topped with cheese sauce, bacon and bleu cheese crumbles

items.name: Pretzel Bites
items.description: Soft pretzel bites served with Monterey jack cheese sauce or honey mustard

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Monterey jack cheese sauce, tomato, lettuce, black olives, onions, jalapeños, sour cream and salsa

items.name: Boneless Wings
items.description: Choice of buffalo, chipotle BBQ, sweet & tangy BBQ or teriyaki sauce

items.name: Pickle Chips
items.description: Pickle chips lightly seasoned with Cajun, hand battered and deep fried to perfection. Served with a side of ranch

items.name: Portabella Mushrooms
items.description: Sliced portabellas hand battered and deep fried to perfection. Served with a side of ranch

items.name: Crab Cakes
items.description: Three 3.5 oz crab cakes served on a bed of spring mix topped with tomatos, jalapeño aioli and balsamic glaze

groupDescription: All dressing served on the side.Your choice of: ranch, French, Italian, honey mustard, thousand island, bleu cheese, Caesar, raspberry vinaigrette, balsamic vinaigrette

items.name: Garden Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, spring mix, tomato, onion, cucumber, green pepper and shredded cheddar cheese and croutons. Served with choice of dressing and garlic toast

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, shredded parmesan cheese and croutons served with caesar dressing. Served with garlic toast

groupDescription: Includes choice of fries, kettle chips, homemade potato salad or cottage cheese. Substitute sweet potato fries, side salad or soup for $2.29.

items.name: Pesto Chicken
items.description: Grilled chicken breast topped with pesto sauce and mozzarella cheese served on a focaccia bun and a side of pesto mayo

items.name: Southwest Chicken
items.description: Fried chicken breast topped with pepper jack cheese, bacon and ancho chipotle sauce served on a sourdough bun

items.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
items.description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, shredded parmesan cheese, grilled chicken and caesar dressing in a garlic herb wrap

items.name: Classic Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Grilled or Fried served on a sourdough bun

addOns.name: Make it a melt with cheese and bacon.

groupDescription: Includes choice of fries, kettle chips, homemade potato salad or cottage cheese. Substitute side salad or soup for $2.29

items.name: Fish Fry
items.description: Four 2 oz pieces of haddock served with tartar sauce, coleslaw and rye bread. Choose up to two flavors: beer battered, seasoned breaded, pan fried cajun, or pan fried lemon pepper

items.name: Blackened Tuna Steak
items.description: 6 oz tuna steak blackened with Cajun seasoning and topped with jalapeño aioli and balsamic glaze

items.name: Beer Battered Fish Sandwich
items.description: Two pieces of beer battered haddock fish topped with cheddar cheese served on a sourdough bun with a side of tartar sauce

items.name: Shrimp Fry
items.description: Eight pieces of shrimp, hand battered and deep fried till golden in our own beer batter. Served with cocktail sauce, coleslaw, rye bread

items.name: Fish Tacos
items.description: Two tortilla shells filled with fish, cheddar cheese, lettuce and tomato topped with ancho chipotle sauce

items.name: Fish Reuben
items.description: Three pieces of haddock blackened topped with coleslaw, Swiss cheese and ancho chipotle sauce served on grilled rye bread

items.name: Salmon
items.description: Two 4oz filets of salmon, choice of blackened, lemon pepper or Key West seasoning.  Served with coleslaw and rye bread

items.name: Shrimp Tacos
items.description: Two tortilla shells filled with shrimp, cheddar cheese, lettuce and tomato topped with ancho chipotle sauce

items.name: Salmon Club
items.description: Grilled salmon topped with a jalapeno aoili, bacon, lettuce and tomato served on a ciabatta bun

groupDescription: Includes choice of fries, kettle chips, homemade potato salad or cottage cheese. Substitute sweet potato fries, side salad or soup for $2.29.

items.name: Jalapeño Popper Burger
items.description: 1/3 pound patty with sautéed jalapeños, fried onions, and topped with cream cheese on a sourdough bun with a side of hot sauce

items.name: Santa Fe Burger
items.description: 1/3 pound patty topped with bacon, sautéed jalapeños, pepper jack cheese and ancho chipotle ranch sauce served on a sourdough bun

items.name: Classic Burger
items.description: 1/3 pound burger patty served on a sourdough bun.

items.name: Western Burger
items.description: 1/3 pound patty smothered in chipotle BBQ with swiss cheese, bacon and onion rings on a sourdough bun

items.name: Dallas Burger
items.description: 1/3 pound patty topped with bacon, cheddar cheese, coleslaw, deep fried pickles and cajun seasoning served on a sourdough bun
